entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Westlock
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High zero.
